Projects | Blog | GitHub Gist | Contact Skills

My name is Kat, but I mainly go by katsaii or nuxii. I'm a BSc Computer Science graduate and I work freelance as a game developer. I spend a lot of time working on personal projects and experiments; sometimes hosting their source code on my GitHub page. Although I specialise as a systems programmer, I work hard to widen my horizons by learning many new computer science topics, and utilising a diverse range of programming languages.

Additionally, I'm not just a programmer! I also enjoy drawing and creating music. Check my contact page for a list of sites where I host my work.
